name: Refrigerated
description:
Endless runner

(right click to crouch, left click to jump)

if you get hit by a snowball, your temperature will decrease

if your temperature get under -2, you are not going to be able to crouch and a heat up button will appear in a random place of the camera, press it to increase your temperature

made in 3 hours

background music from https://chippy01302.itch.io/chippy-music-pack
